section.p: This section contains a narrative description of the problems or diagnoses identified by the clinician at the time of the patient's admission. This section may contain coded entries representing the admitting diagnoses.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-9930, CONF:1198-10391, CONF:1198-32563 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.43"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Hospital Admission Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.43)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15479)/@code="46241-6" Hospital Admission diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15480, CONF:1198-30865)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-9934, CONF:1198-15481)
Conforms to Hospital Admission Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.34:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Hospital Admission Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.43)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15479)/@code="46241-6" Hospital Admission diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15480, CONF:1198-30865)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:9932, R2.1=CONF:1198-9932)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:9933, R2.1=CONF:1198-9933)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-9934, CONF:1198-15481)
Conforms to Hospital Admission Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.34:2015-08-01)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9930, CONF:10391 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.43"
